name: Hell's Hotel
description:
A Demon Cowboy, Checking out of Hell's Hotel. Up to the 20th floor of Hell's Hotel. Battle off against Vampires, Zombies and Lawyers(That's right! Lawyers with guns) with turn-based mechanics inspired by by Slay the Spire and classic Roguelikes like Nethack. Use your cards to fight off the denizens of the Hotel.

Will you make it out redeemed?

Made by RisingThumb and Shrauger
